thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Maxima Grupe Extends Subscriptions In Tender For Emperia Holding Till March 16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maxima Grupe Extends Subscriptions In Tender For Emperia Holding Till March 16
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - EMPERIA HOLDING SA
* MAXIMA GRUPE EXTENDS THE DEADLINE FOR ACCEPTING SUBSCRIPTIONS IN TENDER OFFER FOR SHARES OF EMPERIA HOLDING TILL MARCH 16 AS IT HAS NOT YET RECEIVED THE CONSENT OF THE OFFICE OF COMPETITION AND CONSUMER PROTECTION (UOKIK) FOR TAKEOVER, SAYS LITHUANIAN COMPANY
* INITIALLY SUBSCRIPTIONS WERE SUPPOSED TO END ON FEB. 21 * MAXIME GRUPE ANNOUNCED TENDER OFFER FOR 12,342,027 SHARES OF EMPERIA HOLDING AT 100 ZLOTYS PER SHARE ON NOV. 24, 2017
Source text: bit.ly/2FjWo6r
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
